messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

time cards error sent monday please action submit your cards for approval working resubmit dear received bellow but when try fix resubmit get error best regards sent monday please action submit your cards for approval dear you receiving because you have cards haven submitted for approval please note enough only enter your but also make you submit your for approval take corrective actions case your submitted card gets rejected below breakdown your submitted cards please submit for approval your accordingly possible country submitted cards card status entered entered entered entered total submitted cards submitted cards statuses explained error usually happens when you log calendar view for period longer than days then delete one entry causes timecard switch error fix you should add back for deleted or delete entire timecard using right hand side menu recreate again rejected card was rejected by one approvers please correct card entries accordingly resubmit entered status timecard when only one or few days entire timecard have entered saved cards status passed entered validation but gone next submission step for any card issues you can resolve please wait but raise corresponding incident through portal for resolutions

**Determining HR Relevance**

I'm now fully immersed in the nuances of the time card issue, examining each phrase for contextual clues.
